projects.title: Pastekey
projects.info: Pastekey is a web application that allows you to paste text and save it to a database. All private paste are encrypted by AES-256 encryption, It doesn't store your password or even your password hash in database.

projects.title: UnityWork
projects.info: UnityWork is a platform that connects freelancers and clients. We provide a platform for freelancers to showcase their skills and for clients to find the right freelancer for their project. uild your own PC

projects.title: BuildYourPC
projects.info: Build your own PC is a webapp aims to reduce the time spent on building a PC, it provides you with a list of components and you can build your own PC

experience.content: During pandemic times, I was able to work as a freelancer and as a teacher to teach young people about computer programming and networking.
During this time, I maintained multiple websites and helped businesses establish their online presence. I have also worked on various freelance projects.

experience.postLinkContent: is a one-stop destination for everything related to tattoos
experience.content: As an intern, I was tasked with developing a new version of their API. It was a good opportunity to learn GoLang, GRPC, Protobuf, and microservice architecture.

I learned MEVN stack and worked on their internal tools.
            It was semi-intern & semi-training program where I learned about the industry standards and best practices.

experience.postLinkContent: is top leading automotive portal in India
experience.content:
At CarWale, my role was research-driven, where I focused mainly on frontend performance enhancements. 
            I maintained their oxygen design system, and their frontend library, Implemented micro frontend architecture.
            worked on carwale android app and worked on their internal tools like Ads Manager, Analytics, etc.

At PineLabs(SETU), my role was fullstack-driven, where I developed and maintained ICICI Bank's IFinance Section WebApp.
            Where i worked on React, Typescript, Python, Postgres, Grafana and AWS. I also implemented dashbaord for data-insights team to show analytics to end-users.
